To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Pioneer Rhythm Boys radio show for station WHFB, Benton Harbor, MI. Originally broadcast in May of 1950 [unconfirmed] at 11:30 am. Featuring Mel Irving (announcer), Eddie Skates (host), and (verbally identified) band members Butch, Ray 'The Professor' Watkins, and Rex Watkins. Sponsored by Bill's Auto Service and Al's Grocery. Tape also contains recordings of various performances by the Pioneer Rhythm Boys (performers), Bob Little (performer), the Tennessee Ramblers (performer), and other unidentified performers, all on various dates.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
